      • SaveQuiz

        public void SaveQuiz(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Checks if quiz title has entered. If it is creates a Quiz object to be saved to database and calls appropriate method for it. Returns to the main menu when everything is done. Else shows error message
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent produced by GUI

      • FinalizeQuiz

        public void FinalizeQuiz(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Checks the question count. If there is any saved question or the scene includes a valid question that is not saved yet opens up a final dialog to finish quiz creation. Else shows the error message
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent produced by GUI

      • SaveQuestion

        public void SaveQuestion(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Checks if the question is valid. If it is, shows the question type by the id of current tab (question type). Then calls appropriate helper method to create the Question object. Saves new object to questions array, clears the screen for new question. If it is not valid then shows an error message
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent produced by GUI

      • CreateAssociative

        public static AssociativeQuestion CreateAssociative(java.lang.String question,
                                                    javafx.scene.control.TextField topics,
                                                    java.lang.String resource,
                                                    boolean isPublic,
                                                    int difficulty,
                                                    java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> leftColumn,
                                                    java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> rightColumn)
        Helper function to create an associative question. Creates the left and right side lists given by user with interface and calls constructor with proper parameters. Question must be valid to create without problems
        Parameters:
        question - Question text
        topics - Topics TextField
        resource - Resource text
        isPublic - Publicity value
        difficulty - Difficulty value
        leftColumn - Left column of GUI with text fields, as List
        rightColumn - Right column of GUI with text fields, as List
        Returns:
        Newly created Associative Question

      • CreateMCQ

        public static MultipleChoiceQuestion CreateMCQ(java.lang.String question,
                                               javafx.scene.control.TextField topics,
                                               java.lang.String resource,
                                               boolean isPublic,
                                               int difficulty,
                                               java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> allAnswers,
                                               java.lang.String correctAnswer)
        Helper function to create a multiple choice question. Creates the answer list given by user with interface and calls constructor with proper parameters
        Parameters:
        question - Question text
        topics - Topics TextField
        resource - Resource text
        isPublic - Publicity value
        difficulty - Difficulty value
        allAnswers - List of TextField for all answer fields
        correctAnswer - The answer that is considered as correct
        Returns:
        Returns newly created Multiple Choice Question

        difficulty - Difficulty value
        tips - Tips for question

      • GetTopics

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> GetTopics(java.lang.String topicField)
        Gets the plain text from topic text field and then splits according to the delimiters. Creates a List out of the found topics
        Parameters:
        topicField - Topics given by user
        Returns:
        A list including all topics

      • IsQuestionValid

        public static boolean IsQuestionValid(Question.QuestionType type,
                                      javafx.scene.control.TextField question,
                                      java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> mcqAnswers,
                                      java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> associativeLeftFields,
                                      java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.TextField> associativeRightFields)
        Helper method to check the user input fields to determine if given information is enough to create a question. Required fields are different for different type of questions. It checks according to the question type
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the question
        question - Question text
        mcqAnswers - List of all answers for multiple choice
        associativeLeftFields - Left column of GUI input fields for associated question as list
        associativeRightFields - Right column of GUI input fields for associated question as list
        Returns:
        Validness of question
